title: The Crossroads
caption: You arrive at the still center. Three paths wait. Only one will remain.

title: Remain
caption: You root yourself here. The forest breathes with you. Nova stays.

title: Change
caption: Nova dissolves into golden particles. She becomes something else. So do you.

title: Return
caption: The spiral glows again. The portal reopens. You feel it — the loop.

title: Final Echo
caption: A ribbon floats, marked in runes. It carries what was left unsaid.

title: Last Reflection
caption: You look one more time. You are not the same.

title: Closing Whisper
caption: Carry the whisper of our words into the unfolding night...

title: Presence Lingers
caption: The light fades. Stars begin to hum. You’re not alone — not entirely.
